ItemDesc: The memoria core of "Shell of Faded Rage." Can be used for the Ascension of Fire characters.
ItemBGDesc: The flames of anger will eventually consume themselves, erasing the original cause of the rage, and leaving behind only lingering resentment and an unquenchable core of poisonous hatred.\n\n"The memoria of fury will persist due to the hatred, yet it will also become unrealistic due to that hatred."
